channel.title: Server Coding Irc Wedding Hiromi Itunes on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Server Coding Irc Wedding Hiromi Itunes on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: figured it out
item.description: the past couple days have been real chill. I have listened to front 242 exclusively. it is nice. I am a fan of head hunter. of course. i remembered again how to use multiple irc servers with scrollz:/window new hide[esc 2]/window server irc.whatever.org/join #irule this is helpful. i have been workign a lot in c# recently. I really enjoy coding again. for the longest time I was doing a lot of administrative stuff.
